summary: Project to apply a focused UI theme color update (background, cards, headings, buttons) without impacting existing features or CRUD.
architectural_notes: Make focused UI styling changes only; do not impact existing features or CRUD behavior.
known_issues: Previous attempt to implement the requested color/theme update failed (AI tool reported it couldn't implement).

existing_features.title: Update the global light theme color tokens so the app uses: main background #D6F0FF, cards/sections #FFFFFF, primary headings #2B2B2B, and primary buttons #FFE066 with dark text, without changing any app behavior or CRUD flows.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update UI theme colors: background #D6F0FF, sections/cards #FFFFFF, primary headings #2B2B2B, buttons #FFE066 with dark text (no other feature/CRUD impact)

Keep changes focused to styling only: do not refactor components, routes, queries, or state management; only adjust the minimum CSS/theme variables and any minimal, directly-related hardcoded color classes that prevent the new theme colors from applying.

projectName: Apply focused UI color theme update (background, cards, headings, buttons)
